item.title: Fall Documentary Series: Life According to Sam (HBO Documentary Films)
item.description:
A moving look at a couple's inspiring efforts to save their only son Sam from the rare and fatal premature-aging disease of progeria. Premieres Monday, October 21st at 9PM. Only on HBO.

Author: HBO
Tags: HBO HBO Docs HBO Documentary HBO Documentaries Docs Docu Documentaries Series
